title: DAEMUGA
overview: Fake shaman Sin-nam is a 20-something graduate of a shaman school.  Chung-dam is a real deal, who is possessed by a child god.  And swindling shaman Sung-joon is a middle-aged, whose prime, along with the ghost inside him have all but left.  The3 men battle their skills to seize redevelopment district and compete to be the best shaman.
